title: 哪里会有minecraft forge 2.2？（已找到！）
author: imunknown
txt_content:
本帖最后由 imunknown 于 2011-12-22 18:21 编辑 

在安装工业2for1.0的时候
我遇到了一个问题
问题如下：
Mods loaded: 4
ModLoader 1.0.0
mod_ModLoaderMp 1.0.0
mod_TooManyItems 1.0.0 2011-11-19
mod_IC2 v1.42

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.

If you wish to report this, please copy this entire text and email it to support@mojang.com.
Please include a description of what you did when the error occured.



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 5f03dee9 --------
Generated 11-12-22 下午6:10

Minecraft: Minecraft 1.0.0
OS: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
Java: 1.7.0-ea, Oracle Corporation
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: AMD Radeon HD 6800 Series   version 4.1.11251 Compatibility Profile Context, ATI Technologies Inc.

java.lang.RuntimeException: IndustrialCraft 2: MinecraftForge Too Old, need at least 1.2.2
        at forge.MinecraftForge.killMinecraft(MinecraftForge.java:315)
        at forge.MinecraftForge.versionDetect(MinecraftForge.java:335)
        at mod_IC2.initialize(mod_IC2.java:271)
        at ic2.platform.Ic2.load(Ic2.java:64)
        at ModLoader.init(ModLoader.java:830)
        at ModLoader.AddAllRenderers(ModLoader.java:186)
        at wb.<init>(wb.java:76)
        at wb.<clinit>(wb.java:9)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(SourceFile:265)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:644)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT fdeb10f ----------



刚开始我还以为是见鬼了
突然发现：
java.lang.RuntimeException: IndustrialCraft 2: MinecraftForge Too Old, need at least 1.2.2
可是,在论坛中只找到了是1.0的而且能搜索出来的唯一的下载
http://www.mcbbs.net/search.php?mod=forum&searchid=196&orderby=lastpost&ascdesc=desc&searchsubmit=yes&kw=Forge
具体帖子：
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=13952&highlight=Forge
我又带着希望
重新的覆盖了minecraft.jar的内容
可是
问题依然还这样
但我找不到其他的了
希望有人能帮助我
谢谢各位了
更新
哇！我找到了
放出下载：



minecraftforge-client-1.2.2.zip
(325.49 KB, 下载次数: 125)



2011-12-22 18:19 上传
点击文件名下载附件

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content:
论坛那个帖应该是1.0推出的时候发的，一开始是1.2.0，下载这种东西最好到原帖下载吧
搬给你http://115.com/file/belgnlrp#

replies.author: rainsillwood
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 rainsillwood 于 2011-12-22 18:32 编辑 

mc终于正式了= =可是仍在更新，一群苦逼就跟在后面不停的找api，找mod= =
还有那个1.0是游戏版本= =forge版本是1.2.0

replies.author: wuzuojia
replies.txt_content: 谢谢楼主！ 好东西~感谢分享
